page.title: 13 Religion. Occupations
page.content: {local constituency is Peterborough {whose representative is Coservative. { The general Religious leaning is {Church of England.Being such a small {area they do not have their own {vicar:they share one with Castor, {Sutton,and Marrow.Because of this {shortage their Services are done on a {rotary basis so the Reverand can only {conduct a proper Service on the {last Sunday of every month. } {The charity they collect for {provides funds for the Bonda Hospital {in Zimbabwe run by Doctor Margret {Fielding. { As far as work is concerned of the {people asked 8 work on farms.Others {have individual jobs:there is an {engineer for a firm in Peterborough,a {salesman,a man in the Navy,a person {who works in a residential home,a {hairdresser who works in Peterborough
